text: The 1998–99 Czech First League, known as the Gambrinus liga for sponsorship reasons, was the sixth season of top-tier football in the Czech Republic. The season started on 2 August 1998. ==Stadia and locations== ==League standings== ==Top goalscorers== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !Player !Club !Goals |- !1 |align="left"| Horst Siegl |align="left"|Sparta Prague |18 |- !2 |align="left"| Pavel Verbíř |align="left"|Teplice |13 |- !3 |align="left"| Robert Vágner |align="left"|Slavia Prague |12 |- !rowspan="3"|4 |align="left"| František Koubek |align="left"|Hradec Králové |rowspan="3"|11 |- |align="left"| Vratislav Lokvenc |align="left"|Sparta Prague |- |align="left"| Vítězslav Tuma |align="left"|Drnovice |- !7 |align="left"| Luděk Zelenka |align="left"|Viktoria Žižkov / Slavia Prague |10 |} ==See also== * 1998–99 Czech Cup * 1998–99 Czech 2. title: 1998–99 Czech First League
